1.title: Pothole on Noyes/Sherman intersection
1.description: There is a large pothole in the intersection of Noyes and Sherman, right under the street light.

2.title: Bus system is not good
2.description: The transit system is not efficient, and I am always late for class because the bus doesn't come on time.
replies: Yes, this is an important issue to bring up

3.title: Drivers not yielding
3.description: Drivers are not yielding to walking students, especially by Tech
replies: I've had this happen before, I wanted to bring it up
